Description: Fragmentary tunic sleeve (?); ground cloth woven in undyed and blue linen, decorated with a check pattern in blue on a beige background; tiraz fragment woven in undyed, yellow and red silk applied and sewn onto it, decorated with two lines of pseudo-Kufic inscriptions and two large friezes of stylised vegetal interlacing and stylised animal motifs in medallions. Linen weave: Warp: linen, undyed and blue, S, 13-14/cm Weft: linen, undyed and blue, Z, 22/cm Tiraz: Warp: silk, undyed, S, 16/cm Weft: silk, undyed, yellow and red, I, 64/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
